channel.title: Hucchappayya Math Complex on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Hucchappayya Math Complex on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Aihole and Patadkal
item.description: Day-3, post breakfast we hit the road, this time we followed the GPS voice of Pamelaâ€™s Lumia more attentively and with ease we head out of Hospet and join the highway. The highway NH-13 between Hospet and Bijapur is recently widen to 4 lane. It was a pleasure driving, the road was not at all crowded and surprisingly the trucks maintained the left lane. Was driving around 110/120 KMph without any trouble and soon reached Hungund.
